businessProfile.name: The Social, Provo
businessProfile.address: 65 N University Ave Downstairs Suite 2, Provo, UT 84601, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 65 N University Ave Downstairs Suite 2, Provo, UT 84601, USA

reviews.text: Really cool place to hang out and get a variety of drinks and food.  They have local artists art on the walls for sale.  They also have local musicians do open mic performing on the weekends.  Pool table.  Comfortable seating spaced enough for private conversations.  Spacious.  They also showcase local and upcoming chefs food.  Owner is an awesome guy and the service is friendly and impeccable.  Highly recommend.

Super cool place, the drinks were decent and the Texan whisky drink shocked me that It was alcohol free, but the star of the show by far was the food! The recommended special was amazing (Peruvian chicken) the chicken was flavorful and tender and the Betsy Bowl was really good with their fresh made pasta sauce. I've been making pasta for years with fresh sauce and I dare say it's one of the best I've had in utah as well. Will definitely be eating here again!

If you're coming here, you're coming for the vibes. I loved the idea of the place and as an under-drinking age adult, it was a very nice place. My drink was delicious. The fact we could sit and eat on a couch while playing a game from their impressively extensive party game collection was just the cherry on top. The food was okay, but I will be returning for the drinks alone

This is little gem of a restaurant. Love the lights and the food is like really good for the price. Good for health people. But also good desserts. The owner literally brings you the food. Way underrated rock in the wall.

LOVE the Social! Great urban underground atmosphere to hang out, talk, play games,etc. Also! There are a number of great local food trucks sharing the same kitchen so there is a wide selection of great food! I will be coming back üôå

recentReviews.text: This is now one of my favorite places to bring my friends on a night out the atmosphere is very welcome and you can always find a drink to your taste. They have live music that is good. 10/10 I come here all the time.
Such a fun place to hang out, play games, live music and a wide variety of food!
A friend suggested this fun little place and I thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The food was really great.

The whole vibe was fun. There was good music playing the whole time and there's a billiards table and Jenga set to use. The food was slow to come out, but really good once it did. They have a great selection of mocktails to go with whatever you order.
This place is totally awesome! Great food and not aggressively priced. Awesome live music on the weekends too! I definitely recommend trying it!

It‚Äôs a great venue with so much potential, but the food wasn‚Äôt good (and $40 for two dishes we didn‚Äôt finish along with two decent drinks is pretty expensive, even in Provo). Maybe the food is better and service is faster when it‚Äôs the evening rush and it was just an error on our part to go for lunch when there were only a couple of other people there, but it took a looooong time to get food that should have been warm but was instead cold.
Probably one of the coolest places to hang out in Provo. Food is good. Service is always attentive and friendly and the vibe is amazing.

I had a really good time at the social. Me and some of my college buddies went to hang out one night. We bought some drinks and ate some pretty good chicken tacos. Played pool and just enjoyed the fun atmosphere. Would definitely go again!!!
Disappointing experience with the owner, left feeling disrespected and unwelcome

Very disappointed. Been a fan of the atmosphere, dessert, and events held here, but I will not be returning. Given they serve spirit free tequila shots and began serving alcohol recently, we assumed they served alcoholic shots too (god forbid). After trying to order shots the owner angrily exclaims ‚Äúthis is not ABG‚Äôs, it‚Äôs a restaurant. We do not sell shots here‚Äù. I appreciated the information since I previously thought of The Social as a dry bar (like The Wash) rather than a restaurant, that‚Äôs on me, but it was an honest mistake. Instead of showcasing what they do sell, he was impatient, harsh, and so tense the whole restaurant stopped to watch. I would‚Äôve been glad to order one of their cool drinks and desserts instead, but the interaction was v uncomfortable and unwelcoming, we left speechless.

detailedReviews.author: Reba Harral
detailedReviews.text: This is now one of my favorite places to bring my friends on a night out the atmosphere is very welcome and you can always find a drink to your taste. They have live music that is good. 10/10 I come here all the time.

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Tew
detailedReviews.text: Such a fun place to hang out, play games, live music and a wide variety of food!

detailedReviews.author: Joli Krueger
detailedReviews.text: A friend suggested this fun little place and I thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The food was really great.

detailedReviews.author: Sama Grant
detailedReviews.text: The whole vibe was fun. There was good music playing the whole time and there's a billiards table and Jenga set to use. The food was slow to come out, but really good once it did. They have a great selection of mocktails to go with whatever you order.

detailedReviews.author: Bryce Esau
detailedReviews.text: This place is totally awesome! Great food and not aggressively priced. Awesome live music on the weekends too! I definitely recommend trying it!

detailedReviews.author: Nathaniel Wells
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs a great venue with so much potential, but the food wasn‚Äôt good (and $40 for two dishes we didn‚Äôt finish along with two decent drinks is pretty expensive, even in Provo). Maybe the food is better and service is faster when it‚Äôs the evening rush and it was just an error on our part to go for lunch when there were only a couple of other people there, but it took a looooong time to get food that should have been warm but was instead cold.

detailedReviews.author: Luiz Silva
detailedReviews.text: Probably one of the coolest places to hang out in Provo. Food is good. Service is always attentive and friendly and the vibe is amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Christian Cluff
detailedReviews.text: I had a really good time at the social. Me and some of my college buddies went to hang out one night. We bought some drinks and ate some pretty good chicken tacos. Played pool and just enjoyed the fun atmosphere. Would definitely go again!!!

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Craner
detailedReviews.text: Disappointing experience with the owner, left feeling disrespected and unwelcome

detailedReviews.author: Ki
detailedReviews.text: Very disappointed. Been a fan of the atmosphere, dessert, and events held here, but I will not be returning. Given they serve spirit free tequila shots and began serving alcohol recently, we assumed they served alcoholic shots too (god forbid). After trying to order shots the owner angrily exclaims ‚Äúthis is not ABG‚Äôs, it‚Äôs a restaurant. We do not sell shots here‚Äù. I appreciated the information since I previously thought of The Social as a dry bar (like The Wash) rather than a restaurant, that‚Äôs on me, but it was an honest mistake. Instead of showcasing what they do sell, he was impatient, harsh, and so tense the whole restaurant stopped to watch. I would‚Äôve been glad to order one of their cool drinks and desserts instead, but the interaction was v uncomfortable and unwelcoming, we left speechless.

detailedReviews.author: Damien Carpenter
detailedReviews.text: Great service. Friendly staff. Awesome location.

detailedReviews.author: Tamara Little
detailedReviews.text: EXCELLENT food!!  Menu with great variety. Where else can you get so many ethnic foods available in one place? Fabulous service.. Everybody loved it, and we will definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Castanho
detailedReviews.text:
Loved the open mic night.

Loved the food. Thank you for taking care of our family

Also, Jimmy GlassCock is a legend.

detailedReviews.author: Dallin Cook
detailedReviews.text: It was such a cool vibe and ill 100% be going back with the boys and sone dates. Wonderful place for a double date

detailedReviews.author: JaceLauenstein ;D
detailedReviews.text: Loved the whole place, really welcoming and the food was super good and affordable! Free pool and card games, a good time overall

detailedReviews.author: hayden mauldin
detailedReviews.text: We come here frequently, the owners really frienly and showed us around our first time, as well as made recommendations. The bruschetta is amazing, as well as the Korean chicken thighs, and the service is always amazing. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Kc Johnson
detailedReviews.text: This place is great! The food, the vibe, and the mocktails we got were awesome.  Particularly the Mediterranean bowl, Aimee‚Äôs Bathtub Gin Mocktail were incredible.  Highly recommend it for a couples date night and/or group hangout üëç

detailedReviews.author: Kjirsten King (Kris)
detailedReviews.text: The food okay, but the drinks are horrible. I have been at least three times and just gotten a lemonade that tastes like soap. The actual workers there are lovely but the owner comes to every table every night and is really annoying and in your business. The live music and basement local are fun vibes, but I just can‚Äôt rate it high when the food and drinks are that aweful

detailedReviews.author: Mark Brown
detailedReviews.text: Bad vibes, owner is rude

detailedReviews.author: William Lickiss
detailedReviews.text: This is little gem of a restaurant. Love the lights and the food is like really good for the price. Good for health people. But also good desserts. The owner literally brings you the food. Way underrated rock in the wall.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Haupt
detailedReviews.text: We had an enjoyable time. The staff was super friendly and apologetic. They were just very understaffed, and it took a long time(1.5 hours) for our group of 8 to get all our food. It sounds like they are more geared for dinner. I'll try them again some evening.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Williams
detailedReviews.text: The vibes are fun and it‚Äôs a great hangout spot but the food is overpriced and the portions are small

detailedReviews.author: Wes Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food & great vibes!

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Bird
detailedReviews.text: Great food-lots of variety-fun atmosphere-worth finding!!!

detailedReviews.author: Tpops
detailedReviews.text: l Really great food! Owner and servers are very friendly and care about their customers. Definitely recommend eating here and staying for Sports and live music. Food is worth the price yet not too expensive compared to places where you paymore and don't eat anything Substantial. This place is great. Returning one day for sure again!

detailedReviews.author: Mike Ashcraft
detailedReviews.text: Really cool place to hang out and get a variety of drinks and food.  They have local artists art on the walls for sale.  They also have local musicians do open mic performing on the weekends.  Pool table.  Comfortable seating spaced enough for private conversations.  Spacious.  They also showcase local and upcoming chefs food.  Owner is an awesome guy and the service is friendly and impeccable.  Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa Mowers
detailedReviews.text: Perfect for a first or fourth date!!! The food was delightful! The Summer Flatbread and Caesar salad and dessert üëÄüòã

detailedReviews.author: Dallin Weyland
detailedReviews.text: Great food in a fun setting with good vibes‚Äî all around worth the visit.

detailedReviews.author: Raul Ramos
detailedReviews.text: The ole kitchen was great, all their dishes were so full of flavor. A delicious taste of the Mediterranean cuisine totally recommended. The place atmosphere is friendly and welcoming a good place to go with friends.

detailedReviews.author: Abby Yba√±ez
detailedReviews.text: My friends and I love coming here! The hangout vibes are some of the best in Provo. The food is always delicious and the variety of options makes it a great place for everyone. The owners are so welcoming and personable!

detailedReviews.author: Adelle Seaman
detailedReviews.text: The food and drinks are sooo good!! The staff is friendly and give great recommendations. The ambiance is fun, with lots of choices for seating. I‚Äôve enjoyed live music here in the past as well!

detailedReviews.author: Kelsey Ross
detailedReviews.text: The atmosphere was amazing. The food and drinks were so delicious üòã we will be back soon! I cannot recommend this place enough!

detailedReviews.author: Carter Robison
detailedReviews.text: This place is fun! Friendly staff and a great environment!

detailedReviews.author: Mabel Hillyer
detailedReviews.text: This is my favorite hangout spot in provo, the atmosphere, drinks, and food have always been amazing

detailedReviews.author: Afton Allen
detailedReviews.text: The social is fun and the food is good but the mocktails and pins colados are not good. 5/10 :(

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Jeppson
detailedReviews.text: The food is so good! My favorite are the flat bread pizzas. The atmosphere is so fun too! I always go here when I‚Äôm in town!

detailedReviews.author: Alexandra Miller
detailedReviews.text: Love love love this place!!! The staff and owners are so amazing and go above and beyond :) tasty cocktails and good food! Just tried their Beet Salad and I‚Äôm not normally a salad person but it was so delicious!! It was fresh and well balanced. I really really liked the apricot and quinoa in it. Great place to come hang out<3

detailedReviews.author: catherine Thayn
detailedReviews.text: The food is so good! I love the caprese salad and margarita flat bread! The mocktail bar is such a vibe and I love the card games!

detailedReviews.author: Kellie
detailedReviews.text: Service was great! Cute vibey place with yummy food:) Ximena was amazing!!ü§óü§ó

detailedReviews.author: Lizzie Froisland
detailedReviews.text: Fun drinks that switch up every now and then. I mostly come for the atmosphere. The owner is super nice. He's been there almost every time I've come and he makes a point of interacting and getting to know the customers. It does get kinda hot and loud and the jumanji game is missing pieces, but it makes me feel young and hip to come and people watch all the cute awkward college kids dating and singing karaoke. The women's bathroom is like a walk in freezer though. Beware. Don't get frozen to the seat if you can help it.

detailedReviews.author: Eva Smith
detailedReviews.text: Wide assortment of mocktails, fun live music, and fun games!

detailedReviews.author: April Roemer
detailedReviews.text: Such a cute vibe. Unique food. Really fun city atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Calvin Boyce
detailedReviews.text: Came for the first time to hear live music and was immediately kicked out for being too social

detailedReviews.author: Jared Eaton
detailedReviews.text: Food was great, atmosphere amazing! Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Brenna E.
detailedReviews.text: Great non-alcoholic lounge!!

detailedReviews.author: Erik Hight
detailedReviews.text: This is the most unique and cozy restaurant I've ever been to. The service was great and the food is delicious. It has a dim and rustic underground vibe. Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Sindy Morales
detailedReviews.text: Mi experiencia fue fatal, ped√≠ una luna cubana esper√© 30 minutos por mi plato, el cerdo se ve√≠a sin ning√∫n tipo de color y para colmo mi plato ten√≠a un pelo negro y corto que me imagino que era de la persona que trajo la comida que no se puso gorro ten√≠a el cabello negro y corto porque era hombre, fue desagradable. Deber√≠an tomar en cuenta el tema del gorro. Perd√≠ mi dinero en este lugar.

detailedReviews.author: Kyson Butler
detailedReviews.text: good servicevery kind and quick super fun environment great bar like experience for people who dont drink its a litte pricey cant complain much though cause it makes up for it quality

detailedReviews.author: Sam Miller
detailedReviews.text: This is the owner‚Äôs dream restaurant. His passion for this place is infectious and I will become a repeat customer

detailedReviews.author: Kirsten Smurthwaite
detailedReviews.text: LOVE the Social! Great urban underground atmosphere to hang out, talk, play games,etc. Also! There are a number of great local food trucks sharing the same kitchen so there is a wide selection of great food! I will be coming back üôå

detailedReviews.author: Lauren B
detailedReviews.text: If you're coming here, you're coming for the vibes. I loved the idea of the place and as an under-drinking age adult, it was a very nice place. My drink was delicious. The fact we could sit and eat on a couch while playing a game from their impressively extensive party game collection was just the cherry on top. The food was okay, but I will be returning for the drinks alone

detailedReviews.author: Wes Jones
detailedReviews.text: The dishes were unique and delicious. The atmosphere was quiet. Perfect for an afternoon date.

detailedReviews.author: Heather Oxborrow
detailedReviews.text:
First walking in we were overwhelmed by the choices but the guy who took our order was so so helpful. Shared some of his favorites and more information about everything. We tried several things: Beef Bulgogi, waffle fries, Yoyo's chicken fajita bowl, the Autumn flatbread, Luna Cubana, and chorizo bites. Everything was so delicious!
My favorites were the Bulgogi, waffle fries and the Autumn flatbread.
We then ordered some dessert and tried the chocolate cake, a cranberry and almond tart and the lemon tart. The crusts were excellent. The cranberry almond tart was the absolute best!

detailedReviews.author: Kori Crookston
detailedReviews.text: The food and atmosphere were both amazing. We went on a Friday night and got lots of different dishes to share.   My favorites were the The Autumn Flatbread and the Beef Bulgogi.  Highly recommend the almond cranberry tart for dessert.

detailedReviews.author: Lindsay Ryan
detailedReviews.text: Such a fun atmosphere and amazing staff. The Autumn flatbread was incredible. And the bulgogi was so flavorful and tender. The Cuban has very tender meet and lots of flavor! So many yummy things to try. The loaded fries were sold out so I‚Äôll definitely be back to try those!

detailedReviews.author: Aurora Spute
detailedReviews.text: I love going to the Social, it‚Äôs always such a vibe. Its a great place to wind down and hang out with friends. The churros and winter flatbread are divine, and the mocktails are great. My favorite is Aimee‚Äô Bathtub Gin, but the Pi√±a Colada and Shirley Temple are really great too. They have a pool table in the back my friends and I like to play at and chat. The staff is super friendly and laid back.

detailedReviews.author: Jared Johns
detailedReviews.text: The atmosphere was good. Had the salmon. It was very delicious. The tomatoes, olives, and capers added a Strong flavor which I loved. The one thing I would change would be to have some sort of seasoned asparagus instead of green beans as the side dish.

detailedReviews.author: Sydnie Johns
detailedReviews.text:
Cute atmosphere, live music, and games!  I got the margarita pizza and my brother got the salmon! Both were delicious :)

(Also the staff was very nice and attentive)

detailedReviews.author: Kris Nichols
detailedReviews.text: Stopped in to the Social Provo at the request of a friend. Very glad I did. Ended up grabbing dinner and a Crepe. Alex Wintersmith was performing live! üéµüéºüé§ Good vibes, food music & service! Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Tammy
detailedReviews.text: Amazing location down in the Provo tunnels. The Social has live music on the weekend when we came. We love how they offer like 6 different restaurant/cuisine options so that everyone in your party can get something they want. It has a coffee shop casual feel with great food and alcohol options. Service/staff was amazing. We truly kived this find and you will too. :-)

detailedReviews.author: Kristoffer Bailey
detailedReviews.text: I was extremely curious about the concept of a dry bar here in Provo, so we stopped by to check it out. We were quickly greeted by the chef who made some food recommendations and the host was great at suggesting some of the mocktails on the menu. As we were waiting for our food, I was really impressed by the atmosphere, basically feeling like a more ‚Äúgentle‚Äù bar scene social setting with great live music. When the food came I honestly did not expect the impressive presentation and the food was delicious. Everything tasted really high quality and fresh. Overall, it‚Äôs a fun setting, the food is great, and the employees are all extremely friendly. Definitely one of my new favorite places in Utah Valley!

detailedReviews.author: Adam S
detailedReviews.text: Super cool place, the drinks were decent and the Texan whisky drink shocked me that It was alcohol free, but the star of the show by far was the food! The recommended special was amazing (Peruvian chicken) the chicken was flavorful and tender and the Betsy Bowl was really good with their fresh made pasta sauce. I've been making pasta for years with fresh sauce and I dare say it's one of the best I've had in utah as well. Will definitely be eating here again!

detailedReviews.author: Riley Parrish
detailedReviews.text: Amazing service and delicious food! Would recommend to anyone!

detailedReviews.author: Colin Pettry
detailedReviews.text: This food was so great it literally changed my life.

detailedReviews.author: Jake Motzkus
detailedReviews.text: This is my new favorite restaurant ever! Would give it 10 stars if I could!

detailedReviews.author: Caleb Warren
detailedReviews.text: Got super wasted here!

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Mehta
detailedReviews.text: Great place good food

detailedReviews.author: Jaidyn Bundy
detailedReviews.text: I loved the place so much it‚Äôs so cute!! The food and drinks were amazing and the people serving were so nice. 100% recommend for a unique fun outing!

detailedReviews.author: Ashlyn Adams
detailedReviews.text:
The Social provides a cool space to dine, socialize and experience Provo!

The flatbread was amazing, great flavor with just the right crunch of crust.

Staff were helpful and attentive while maintaining a steady flow of customers (band was performing and it was BUSY). I enjoyed having staff take time to check on my experience and make sure I was satisfied with my dish. Very obvious that this is a key point of emphasis. 10/10 recommend it was a great experience all around!

detailedReviews.author: Patricia Munoz
detailedReviews.text: The Social is a great place to get a variety of foods. I am very picky about food but I highly recommend The Luna Cubana, The Chorizo Bites, The Greek Flatbread or Salad and finally for dessert The Killer Churro plate or Flourless Chocolate Torte that has a delicious orange taste.  If you like music Fridays they have live music. For a quiet dinner Monday Tuesday or Saturday early evening are best. The owners are very hands on so the service is great.

detailedReviews.author: R Jarman
detailedReviews.text:
We just found this place and LOVE it!  Atmosphere, food, music & football.
Highly recommend the Tom Tom Bowl.
Do we wish they had booze? Yeah, but they‚Äôve done such a good job checking all the other boxes that we‚Äôll forgive them. üòâü§©

detailedReviews.author: 5azgirls
detailedReviews.text: What a fun Place to dine.  The owners were super kind and all the staff were friendly.  Intimate and food was delicious.   We had Mama Dos pizza flat bread.  So delicious & Filling.  We ordered 4 for 6 people.

detailedReviews.author: Chandler Lewis
detailedReviews.text: DONT come here. Just don‚Äôt.

detailedReviews.author: Edward G
detailedReviews.text: Went here with friends and they brought out 2 plates of crepes. The lady just set it down and mumbled. We found out that same lady was The co-owner and she told us to pay for it since we took a bite and we were willing. The owner comes out and says you shouldn‚Äôt do that, we told him that she put it down and we didn‚Äôt know who ordered it. It was a misunderstanding. She proceeded to yell at us saying that we needed to pay. First of all, not our fault they brought the wrong plate to the wrong table. Second, have some customer service. Jesus Christ. Very disappointed, I loved this place and after that I will NOT be going back.

detailedReviews.author: Heather Mortensen
detailedReviews.text: I have enjoyed coming to The Social for quite some time now and got friendly and familiar with the staff. Well, tonight that changed. I was sitting down with my party of 4 on a hectic, busy night. While only half my party was at the table, some Lady who claimed to be the co-owner brought us a crepe. She didn‚Äôt say a word when she left it on the table.  Not knowing what the other people in my party had ordered, we all started digging in as we were sharing all of our other food. Both the owner and the ‚Äúco-owner‚Äù came back demanding we pay for the second crepe, yelling at us. Telling us ‚Äúyou don‚Äôt do something like that‚Äù and how dishonest we were. The co-owner said she would like to take our names down if we didn‚Äôt cooperate. Super disappointed with my experience at The Social tonight.

detailedReviews.author: Hailey Williams
detailedReviews.text: Got yelled at by both of the owners for them bringing out a wrong item and us not knowing. Then demanding we pay for it. We said it wasn‚Äôt a big deal and that we would pay for it. We were just confused why we were getting yelled at for a mix up that had nothing to do with us!! Me and my friends used to go here multiple times a week and will never be returning. Would not recommend their service was horrible and no one should be yelled at like that.

detailedReviews.author: ella tate
detailedReviews.text: Co-owner was being very unprofessional to us and blamed us for them bring us a dish we didn‚Äôt order and after we said we‚Äôd pay for it she continued to yell at us. Very Terrible service and don‚Äôt recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Dione Pierre-Louis
detailedReviews.text: Randomly discovered this spot walking around and wondering what was below this shops of university. To my surprise there was a whole restaurant with a vibe that I like. Love music and a chill social environment. On top of that they had food of all variety‚Äôs. I‚Äôm from South Florida so I tried what I was use to with the Luna Cubana. That pork was tender and delicious. Def recommend yall check it out.

detailedReviews.author: Tess Horan
detailedReviews.text: I really loved the live music and the food. The employees are so nice and welcoming very personable and social. They gave us a free crepe to try which was delicious! I had the Tortilla de patata which was just like from Spain ^.^ I also had the churros and they were so fresh and good. 10/10 recommend! :D<3

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Ence
detailedReviews.text: Super helpful and accommodating staff

detailedReviews.author: Franco Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: The Margerita flat bread was delicious, and so was the The Queen flat bread. Great service and a great atmosphere. I strongly recommend a visit

detailedReviews.author: Jacob Nelson
detailedReviews.text:
The Social is a cozy place to enjoy any of a wide variety of foods. The interior is very spacious and well kept. The staff were friendly.

We were both very confused upon entering, however. You're supposed to order at the bar, but it doesnt look like place you order. We stood around confused for 5 minutes while the employees seemed indifferent to our presence.

I got chuck's backyard burger, which was pretty uninspiring. It wasn't bad, and if you like simple food, you'll probably enjoy it. Personally, i wished it had more flavor. The fries i got with it were a little crispier than I would've liked.

My wife got the kimchi fried rice with spam. I tried a little and it was amazing, but there was no hint of kimchi that i could see.

On both of our dishes, the portion sizes left a lot to be desired.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Tuttle
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal, went out tonight with my buddy‚Äôs when we were bored and looking for stuff to do, and was absolutely jaw dropped by the atmosphere, the service, as well as the food. The live music was amazing, and thus the great vibes it brought along. The service was phenomenal, not only the workers but the owner out enjoying the night and doing amazing making sure absolutely everyone was enjoying it as well and was served well. The food that we got was presented amazing and tasted even better. AND the kitchen looked very well maintained and clean, which as a restaurant manager is very impressive. Everyone on shift should be very proud of their work, and I would highly recommend going.

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Weston
detailedReviews.text: The social is the best spot in Provo! It‚Äôs so fun to try new things, the gambas are the best

detailedReviews.author: Ally Myers
detailedReviews.text: Perfect place for a date night or hanging with friends! Great food (especially the Gambas). Highly recommend coming here!

detailedReviews.author: Brendon Cochran
detailedReviews.text: This place is such a vibe. We come here all the time to try new things and have never left disappointed. You HAVE to try the Gambas Al Ajillo, sooooo good.

detailedReviews.author: Zach Cochran
detailedReviews.text: My wife and I LOVE this place! We come all the time for the Gambas shrimp, so delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Emilia Bowen
detailedReviews.text: Love the food love the place

detailedReviews.author: Eden Orr
detailedReviews.text:
The Tom Tom Bowl is amazing!! I loved all the flavors and was super sad when I finished my bowl. Very healthy and filling!
1000/10 recommend.:)

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.3/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the welcoming atmosphere and fun vibe, enhanced by live music and games like billiards and Jenga. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant offers a wide variety of delicious food options, including ethnic dishes and mocktails, which are highly praised by customers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The friendly and attentive service, often personalized by the owner, leaves a lasting impression on guests. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative interactions with the owner and co-owner leading to a poor customer experience - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and cold food during non-peak hours - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor drink quality and confusion about offerings - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Reba Harral
positive.text: This is now one of my favorite places to bring my friends on a night out the atmosphere is very welcome and you can always find a drink to your taste. They have live music that is good. 10/10 I come here all the time.

positive.author: Nicole Tew
positive.text: Such a fun place to hang out, play games, live music and a wide variety of food!

positive.author: Joli Krueger
positive.text: A friend suggested this fun little place and I thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The food was really great.

neutral.author: Jacob Nelson
neutral.text:
The Social is a cozy place to enjoy any of a wide variety of foods. The interior is very spacious and well kept. The staff were friendly.

We were both very confused upon entering, however. You're supposed to order at the bar, but it doesnt look like place you order. We stood around confused for 5 minutes while the employees seemed indifferent to our presence.

I got chuck's backyard burger, which was pretty uninspiring. It wasn't bad, and if you like simple food, you'll probably enjoy it. Personally, i wished it had more flavor. The fries i got with it were a little crispier than I would've liked.

My wife got the kimchi fried rice with spam. I tried a little and it was amazing, but there was no hint of kimchi that i could see.

On both of our dishes, the portion sizes left a lot to be desired.

negative.author: Nathaniel Wells
negative.text: It‚Äôs a great venue with so much potential, but the food wasn‚Äôt good (and $40 for two dishes we didn‚Äôt finish along with two decent drinks is pretty expensive, even in Provo). Maybe the food is better and service is faster when it‚Äôs the evening rush and it was just an error on our part to go for lunch when there were only a couple of other people there, but it took a looooong time to get food that should have been warm but was instead cold.

negative.author: Andrea Craner
negative.text: Disappointing experience with the owner, left feeling disrespected and unwelcome

negative.author: Ki
negative.text: Very disappointed. Been a fan of the atmosphere, dessert, and events held here, but I will not be returning. Given they serve spirit free tequila shots and began serving alcohol recently, we assumed they served alcoholic shots too (god forbid). After trying to order shots the owner angrily exclaims ‚Äúthis is not ABG‚Äôs, it‚Äôs a restaurant. We do not sell shots here‚Äù. I appreciated the information since I previously thought of The Social as a dry bar (like The Wash) rather than a restaurant, that‚Äôs on me, but it was an honest mistake. Instead of showcasing what they do sell, he was impatient, harsh, and so tense the whole restaurant stopped to watch. I would‚Äôve been glad to order one of their cool drinks and desserts instead, but the interaction was v uncomfortable and unwelcoming, we left speechless.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
